metadata.title: CVE-2023-37327 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow leading to heap overwrite in FLAC image tag handling

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good0.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
